name: US Commando Shooting Fight
description:
The ultimate smashy FPS game with extreme action packed missions. Thugs have sinister plans to take over the entire world, they have the most wanted evil scientist and with the help of scientist they have made the nuclear bomb and weapons. This Commando Shooting Fight has 8 different strategic missions and in each mission you have to complete a different assignment given by authorities. Thugs hopelessly want to initiate baleful battle against you and entire world, and the survival of the entire world is solely in your hands. They pose a massive threat to the world peace, you have to stop them, act as super commando hero save the whole world from thugs.

It is the right time for you to get-up as a real shooter and save the humanity, Be a solid frontline commando and turn the tables over by stopping enemies from executing their satanic plans. You are the only one who knows about the military hideouts of the thugs you have to act real quick. Evil thugs are very well-equipped with the latest weapon system, you have to be vgilant. Stealthily get into enemy's headquarters and kill them all. Use the weapons that you have at your disposal, your main objective is to capture the evil scientist his boss and kill the mafia leader. Embattle for the super smashy battle.

As a commando agent you have to be strategically tactical and decisive to move ahead steadily and hammer all the enemy thugs. Fullfil your dream and become army shooter and wipeout every dangerous anti state element.
The spellbinding environments and electrifying story will cement you with your device.

How to play:
-Read the mission objectives clearly.
-By default you have a limited amount of ammo
-Tap to pick weapons
-Follow the instructions of radar to hunt down the enemies
-Be sharp and accurate with your shooting

Features:
-8 dealy missions
-Action-packed commando adventure
-Smooth gameplay controls
-More than 6 dealy weapons
-Realistic weapon and reload sounds
-Jaw-dropping 3D graphics
-Incredible sound effects
